text: int main ( ) { int t , n , i , j , m ; scanf ( "%d " , & t ) ; for ( i = 1 ; i <= t ; t -- ) { scanf ( "%d" , & n ) ; int a [ n ] [ n ] ; for ( i = 0 ; i < n ; i ++ ) { for ( j = 0 ; j < n ; j ++ ) { if ( i >= j ) { scanf ( "%d" , & a [ i ] [ j ] ) ; } } } for ( i = ( n - 1 ) ; i >= 0 ; i -- ) { for ( j = 0 ; j < n ; j ++ ) { if ( i >= j && a [ i ] [ j ] < a [ i ] [ j + 1 ] ) m = a [ i ] [ j + 1 ] ; else m = a [ i ] [ j ] ; a [ i - 1 ] [ j ] += m ; } } printf ( "%d\n" , a [ 0 ] [ 0 ] ) ; } return 0 ; }
